com.ociweb.xml

Interface CommonWAX

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ElementWAX, PrologOrElementWAX, PrologWAX, StartTagWAX
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WAX

    public interface CommonWAX
    This interface groups methods that are shared with PrologueWAX and ElementWAX.
